column4: is there a command i can use to add a string of text to the end of a file?
make sure you don't miss a > or your file will be overwritten
i have a file crontab in ~/
says to create a file crontab
then run crontab ~/.local/etc/crontab, although my fole is in ~/ rather than ~/.local/etc
well ~/crontab gives me the same result
you aren't supposed to just run "~/crontab~"... read what it says
oh, running that file is to create the file?
